title: Aimersoft Video Converter Ultimate 3.5.1 [K'ed]
description:
Link for more info: http://www.aimersoft.com/mac-video-converter-ultimate.html
Inludes: [K] Register with anything you want


The Ultimate Video Management Tool for Mac

- The integrated Mac app to convert video, edit video, download video, rip, burn and copy home DVD movies to meet all your multimedia needs.
- Convert to and from MP4, MOV, AVI, WMV, MKV, MP3, WMA, etc.
- Rip DVD to all regular video/audio formats and devices
- Create DVD movies from both homemade and downloaded video
- Download videos from 50+ video sharing sites like YouTube and Hulu
- Easy operation and 30X fast conversion speed

Convert Any Video and Audio Format

With Video Converter Ultimate for Mac, you can quickly convert virtually any video and audio files to all popular video/audio formats like MOV, MP4, AVI, WMV, MKV, FLV, 3GP, VOB, ASF, SWF, DV, MP3, M4A, WAV, M4R, AAC, OGG, AC3 and more. Then newest version even adds some advanced encoders like Apple Intermediate Codec, ProRes and DNxHD, allowing you to convert video to seamlessly fit iMovie, iDVD, Final Cut Pro, etc. Meanwhile, it comes with a built-in editor that lets you trim video and audio clips, crop frame size, merge videos, add special video effects, insert subtitles and adjust video effects to suite your needs. Simply add your video and audio files, and then enjoy them anywhere you like!

Rip, Burn and Copy DVD on Mac with Ease

Rip DVD to any video & audio format
The Mac Video Converter lets you rip DVD to any video and audio format and transfer it to all your pods, pads, phones, etc. for viewing whenever and wherever.
Burn any local or web video to DVD
Select the Burn tab and drag the downloaded web videos or others to burn videos to DVD with customized DVD menus for play on your home DVD player or TV.
Backup DVDs even with encryption
Simply copy and backup DVD or DVD files like Video_TS, ISO, and .dvdmedia to a new DVD disc for better saving or easier viewing on home DVD players.

Save, Share and Transfer Media Files Anywhere

Convert and share with ease
Save all converted video and audio files to any directory you want and share them with family and friends without worrying about the format.
Fit mobile devices and video editing apps seamlessly
Convert video and DVD to video files with optimized settings to fit your iPhone 5, iPhone 4S, iPhone 4, iPod touch 5, iPad, iPad 4, iPad mini, Apple TV, PSP, Xbox 360, BlackBerry, HTC, Samsung and more
Share converted video online more easily
With the provided web video presets, you can directly convert video for share on YouTube and more.

Download Online Web Video with a Click

It's the Ultimate Video Converter for Mac! Yeah, there should be more features that can surprise you and of course it won't let you down! With it, you can easily download movies, music videos, TV shows and more from popular video sharing sites like YouTube, Hulu, VEVO, AOL, Metacafe, Dailymotion, Vimeo, MTV, CBS, Yahoo, BBC, ESPN, BlipTV, etc. 50+ sites easily: either click the Download button that appears on the top of the video that is playing or drag the video URL to the Media Browser to download the video you want. Enjoy online video offline is just so easy!

User-friendly Design and Easy Operation

Easy to load files
Easy to load all your videos, movies, music, and DVD files from your Mac with the preset Media Browser directly connected with your local media directories.
Clear and vivid interface
With the three vivid thumbnails for Convert, Burn and Download options, you can enter the main interface for your needs easily with a single click.
User-friendly design
The intuitive interface lets you convert video, convert audio, rip, copy and burn DVDs in less time.

More Features

Batch Conversion

Convert multiple files at a time to ensure an efficient conversion.

Merge Video
Merge all the selected video items to export a single video file.

Real-time Preview

Supported OS:

Mac OS X 10.6, 10.7 and 10.8
All editing effects can be real-time previewed to ensure the results
